Ancestry-Elf -- Male Woodland Elf Fighter

Background: Acolyte Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 482/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 30 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Fast: +5 Speed
Nimble Elf: +5 Speed
Tree Climber: Has a 10' climb Speed
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 2; General: 0 Selectable Feature Count: Elf (Heritage); Fighter (Key Attribute)
Feats: Ageless Patience; Ancestral Longevity; Ancestral Suspicion; Avenge Ally; Bard Dedication; Elf Step; Elven Lore; Elven Weapon Familiarity; Expert Longevity; Forlorn; Magic Rider; Martial Experience; Nimble Elf; Otherworldly Acumen; Otherworldly Magic; Reactive Shield; Tree Climber; Universal Longevity; Unwavering Mien Fighter Features: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Attribute Boost (Dexterity); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Fighter); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Dexterity; Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Attribute; Fighter Skills; Perception Expert; Reactive Strike; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block Acolyte Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Elf Features: Ancestry Feats; Ancient Elf; Arctic Elf; Attribute Boost (Dexterity; Intelligence; Choose 1 from any); Attribute Flaw (Constitution); Cavern Elf; Elf Heritage; Fast; Low-Light Vision; Seer Elf; Whisper Elf; Woodland Elf
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
Ancient Elf: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Cavern Elf: Has the Darkvision feature
Elf Heritage: 1 selection
Elven Lore: Has the Additional Lore (Elven Lore) feature
Fighter Feats: 1 selections
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +5 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +5 (dexterity; trained) Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +5 (intelligence; trained) Elven Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained)
Architecture Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Society: +5 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +2 (strength; trained) Medicine: +0 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Cavern Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +3 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Occultism: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +2 (charisma; untrained) Underground Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained)
Languages: Common; Elven; Kholo; Sakvroth
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Elven Lore): Skill Trained (Elven Lore)
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Deity And Cause: Survival
Elven Lore: Skill Trained (Arcana; Nature)
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 5 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Ageless Patience: May spend double the time normally required on a Perception or skill check to gain a +2 bonus and suffer a critical failure only on a roll of 10 lower than the DC
Ancestral Longevity: Gains Trained proficiency in a choice of skill during daily prep
Ancestral Suspicion: +2 Sense Motive to detect controlled creatures
Expert Longevity: Gains expert proficiency in a chosen trained skill during daily prep and may replace an existing skill increase with one chosen for Ancestral Longevity or Expert Longevity upon expiration
Seer Elf: +1 to Identify Magic and Decipher Writing of a magical nature
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Universal Longevity: (1) Replaces the Ancestral Longevity and Expert Longevity skills once per day
Whisper Elf: +2 Seek within 30' and reduces the DC to find a concealed or hidden target to 3 or 9
Woodland Elf: Can Climb foliage at 15', or 30' on a critical success
Combat
Hit Points: 16 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Light Pick (+6 1d4+1 P [Crit d8]; strength; expert); Longspear (+6 1d8+1 P; strength; expert); Shield Boss (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Elf Weapons; Longbow; Composite Longbow; Rapier; Shortbow; Composite Shortbow)
Martial Experience: +1 attack with untrained weapons
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Avenge Ally: (1) Uses the better of 2 rolls on a Strike when within 30' of a dying ally once per 10 min
Elf Step: (1) Steps twice
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon elf weapons
Reactive Shield: (R) Performs Raise A Shield to absorb damage from a melee Strike
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Woodland Elf: Can always Take Cover within forest terrain
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Ancestral Suspicion: +2 vs. control effects, and successes are critical successes
Arctic Elf: Has cold resistance 1 and treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Forlorn: +1 vs. emotion effects, and successes vs. emotion effects are critical successes
Unwavering Mien: Reduces the duration of mental effects lasting at least 2 rd by 1 rd/Saves vs. sleep effects gain +1 degree of success
Magic
Attack: Arcane Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells: Detect Magic (AC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the rank of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Magic Notes:
Seer Elf: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate cantrip
Magic Rider: Can bring another person when affected by a multiple-target teleportation spell, and always arrives within 1 mile of the desired location
Otherworldly Acumen: Can cast a chosen 2nd-rank spell as an innate spell once per day and use a day of downtime to change the spell chosen
Otherworldly Magic: Can cast a chosen arcane cantrip as an innate spell at will
Notes
